meanings.definition: The sport of riding on a sailboard.
meanings.sent1: Boardsailing is a fun water sport that involves riding on a sailboard.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching boardsailing competitions at the beach.
meanings.sent3: When I tried boardsailing for the first time, I kept falling into the water!
meanings.sent4: His grace on the water while boardsailing was like a dance with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sail against the blue sky during boardsailing is a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: To engage in the sport of boardsailing.
meanings.sent1: I want to learn how to boardsail this summer.
meanings.sent2: They often boardsail on the weekends for relaxation.
meanings.sent3: After work, he loves to boardsail to unwind and clear his mind.
meanings.sent4: She boardsailed across the lake with skill and determination.
meanings.sent5: The friends decided to boardsail together for an exciting adventure.
